track.name: Love Me Like A Man
comments: LOVE THIS!!! Diana Krall (Mrs. Elvis Costello), jazz pianist/singer covered this. She did a good job on this too!!! To the bone, Bonnie!!!
voice and guitar to, what more can you ask..................
Bonnie does it for me......seen her in wembly,  london  some years ago...
Truly one of her best; a real classic!!
Sorrry to disagree, diana; I think Bonnie can tear it up, when she plays the blues! She is a superb singer and guitarist. Her father was an oprera singer for many years.
starts off OK but loses it .. :(
Man this is some great pickin'.
Ah, if only men would listen....lol
My God! This is the woman I want to marry! Have my children, play me music, and show what a woman is supposed to be like. Is this asking too much?
